explanation: [0-0] A boy wearing a white shirt and pink shorts stands next to a black water pump connected to a yellow hose. The water pump sits on a gravel patch surrounded by some green plants, and a green water bottle lies beside it.
[0-10] The boy shakes the handle of the pump, causing the wheel on the pump to rotate. He struggles to turn the handle but fails to start the pump. The boy in the white shirt runs towards the right.
